categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Garel's Honor was a Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvette that served in the naval forces of the Rebel Alliance during the Imperial Era. During that time, it participated in an engagement along with at least two other Sphyrna-class corvettes against a group of the Galactic Empire's Gozanti-class cruisers while it carried cargo near several celestial bodies.

During the engagement, the corvette critically damaged one of the imperial freighters by ramming its frontal dorsal bulkhead on the cruiser's midship, causing the Gozanti-class' front half to start being split off. It shared its name with the Lothal sector planet Garel.

Garel's Honor was equipped with three engines and three dual laser cannons with one mounted on a dorsal turret in the rear half of the ship, and the other two being mounted on both sides of the bridge's viewport. It was painted in an orange color scheme.
Garel's Honor was introduced in on a card of the same name in the Hammerhead Corvettes Expansion Pack, a 2017 expansion for the Star Wars: Armada miniatures game by Fantasy Flight Games.
